The video features Billy Te Kahika: the leader of the New Zealand Public Party, making the claim that the New Zealand Defence Force (NZDF) can enter private residences in response to COVID-19.
The Facebook post: s caption states that Jacinda Ardern, the Prime Minister of New Zealand, passed a bill allowing soldiers to enter any home without a permit and remove individuals under the new health act.
Legal expert Dr Edward Willis clarified: 19 Public Health Response Act 2020 only allows warrantless entries into private residences for police officers, not the military.
